item.title: [Bulby] How can I Savebackup After Death?
item.dc:creator: @_Secret _Secret_
item.description:
@_Secret wrote:

When People are pking in my server they die then load there backup file and get all there items back.

I tryed adding this to my Player.java

requestAnim(7197, 0); if (deathDelay >= 0) { if(AtDuel() == false && AtClanField() == false && AtClanLobby() == false && AtPits() == false && Engine.wildernessArea(absX, absY)) { dropAllItems(getPlayerKiller()); Engine.fileManager.savebackup(p); <--------------- added that FamiliarType = 0; FamiliarID = 0; frames.setTab(this, 80, 18); }

But i get this error:

Plz help me, so it saves the backup file after they die.

Read full topic
